import React from "react"; export default function PDFInvoice({ cart, buyer, grandTotal }) { return (

üßæ Invoice ‚Äî {buyer?.name}

üè† Address: {buyer?.address}

üßæ GSTIN: {buyer?.gstin}

üóì Date: {new Date().toLocaleDateString()}

{cart.map((item, i) => { const total = (item.billedQty * item.rate * (1 - item.discount / 100)).toFixed(2); return ( ); })}
Item Batch MFG EXP Qty Rate Billed Qty Discount% Total ‚Çπ
{item.name} {item.batch} {item.mfg} {item.exp} {item.qty} {item.rate} {item.billedQty} {item.discount} ‚Çπ {total}
Grand Total: ‚Çπ {grandTotal.toFixed(2)}
); }
